Tartarus

Pomegranates

24 Aug 2019

What on earth is the deal with pomegranates? They’re like an alien’s brain or some shit. And they take so much time for relatively little reward. Honestly a 4/10 fruit, must do better.

(I needed to write a blog today and I’m going to the pub in 5 minutes, leave me alone. )
